title: Bru library quality metric
description: Schema for reporting Bru assay library quality metric

nMap.title: Mapped read count
nMap.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the standard chromosomes in the genome bam file

nMapUniq.title: Uniquely mapped read count
nMapUniq.description: Reads or read pairs uniquely mapped to the standard chromosomes in the genome bam file (MAPQ >= 255)

nLibOnce.title: Uniquely mapped reads appearing once
nLibOnce.description: Unduplicated reads or read pairs uniquely mapped to the standard chromosomes in the genome bam file (MAPQ >= 255)

nLibMulti.title: Uniquely mapped reads duplicated one or more times
nLibMulti.description: Duplicated reads or read pairs uniquely mapped to the standard chromosomes in the genome bam file (MAPQ >= 255)

nPos.title: Number of genomic positions where reads are mapped
nPos.description: Genomic positions (one per read or read pair) in the standard chromosomes where any number of reads are mapped uniquely

nPosOnce.title: Number of genomic positions with exactly one mapped read
nPosOnce.description: Genomic positions (one per read or read pair) in the standard chromosomes where exactly one read is mapped uniquely

nPosMulti.title: Number of genomic positions with more than one mapped read
nPosMulti.description: Genomic positions (one per read or read pair) in the standard chromosomes where any number of reads are mapped uniquely (nPos - nPosOnce)

nRRNA.title: Ribosomal RNA read counts
nRRNA.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the ribosomal RNA in the premap bam file

nChrM.title: Mitochondrial RNA read counts
nChrM.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the mitochondrial genome in the premap bam file

nEBV.title: EBV read counts
nEBV.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the Epstein-Barr viral genome in the premap bam file

nMapLabeledAll.title: Total labeled spike-in read count
nMapLabeledAll.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to all Bru-labeled spike-in references in both genome and premap bam files

nMapUnlabeledAll.title: Total unlabeled spike-in read count
nMapUnlabeledAll.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to all unlabeled spike-in references in both genome and premap bam files

nMap_IVT_AGP23.title: AT AGP23 labeled spike-in read count
nMap_IVT_AGP23.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to A. thaliana AGP23, a Bru-labeled, in vitro transcribed spike-in, from the genome bam file

nMap_IVT_OBF5.title: AT OBF5 labeled spike-in read count
nMap_IVT_OBF5.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to A. thaliana OBF5, a Bru-labeled, in vitro transcribed spike-in, from the genome bam file

nMap_IVT_PDF1.title: AT PDF1 unlabeled spike-in read count
nMap_IVT_PDF1.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to A. thaliana PDF1, an unlabeled, in vitro transcribed spike-in, from the genome bam file

nMap_IVT_AP2.title: AT AP2 unlabeled spike-in read count
nMap_IVT_AP2.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to A. thaliana AP2, an unlabeled, in vitro transcribed spike-in, from the genome bam file

nMap_chrEC.title: EC unlabeled spike-in read count
nMap_chrEC.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the E. coli genome from the genome bam file. E. coli RNA is an unlabeled spike-in.

nMapUniq_chrEC.title: EC unlabeled spike-in uniquely mapped read count
nMapUniq_chrEC.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to the E. coli genome from the genome bam file. EC RNA is an unlabeled spike-in.

dm6_nMap.title: DM labeled spike-in genome read count
dm6_nMap.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the D. melanogaster genome (dm6) from the genome bam file. DM RNA is a Bru-labeled spike-in.

dm6_nMap_premap.title: DM labeled spike-in premap read count
dm6_nMap_premap.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the D. melanogaster from the premap bam file. DM RNA is a Bru-labeled spike-in.

dm6_nMapAll.title: DM labeled spike-in read count
dm6_nMapAll.description: Reads or read pairs mapped to the D. melanogaster genome (dm6), including mitochondrial and rRNA references (dm6_nMap + dm6_nMap_premap). DM RNA is a Bru-labeled spike-in.

dm6_nMapUniq.title: DM labeled spike-in genome uniquely mapped read count
dm6_nMapUniq.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to the D. melanogaster genome (dm6) from the genome bam file. DM RNA is a Bru-labeled spike-in.

dm6_nMapUniq_premap.title: DM labeled spike-in premap uniquely mapped read count
dm6_nMapUniq_premap.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to the D. melanogaster mitochondrial and rRNA references from the premap bam file. DM RNA is a Bru-labeled spike-in.

dm6_nMapUniqAll.title: DM labeled spike-in uniquely mapped read count
dm6_nMapUniqAll.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to the D. melanogaster genome (dm6), including mitochondrial and rRNA references (dm6_nMapUniq + dm6_nMapUniq_premap). DM RNA is a Bru-labeled spike-in.

nSplc.title: Spliced read count
nSplc.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to the standard chromosomes that contain at least one N in the CIGAR string

n_exon_antisense.title: Exonic antisense read count
n_exon_antisense.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to exons on the antisense strand in the standard chromosomes

n_exon_sense.title: Exonic sense read count
n_exon_sense.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to exons on the sense strand in the standard chromosomes

n_intergenic.title: Intergenic read count
n_intergenic.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to the standard chromosomes, but not overlapping exons or introns

n_intron_antisense.title: Intronic antisense read count
n_intron_antisense.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to introns on the antisense strand in the standard chromosomes

n_intron_sense.title: Intronic sense read count
n_intron_sense.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to introns on the sense strand in the standard chromosomes

n_ambiguous.title: Ambiguous read count
n_ambiguous.description: Reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to more than one gene in the standard chromosomes

fracRRNA.title: Fraction of ribosomal RNA reads in library
fracRRNA.description: Fraction of reads or read pairs mapped to rRNA in the library (nRRNA / nReads)

fracChrM.title: Fraction of mitochondrial RNA reads in library
fracChrM.description: Fraction of reads or read pairs mapped to the mitochondrial genome in the library (nChrM / nReads)

frac_intron_sense.title: Fraction of intron sense reads
frac_intron_sense.description: Fraction of reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to introns on the sense strand relative to all uniquely mapped reads or pairs in the standard chromosomes (n_intron_sense / nMapUniq)

frac_exon_sense.title: Fraction of exon sense reads
frac_exon_sense.description: fraction of reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to exons on the sense strand relative to all uniquely mapped reads or pairs in the standard chromosomes (n_exon_sense / nMapUniq)

frac_intergenic.title: Fraction of intergenic reads
frac_intergenic.description: Fraction of reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to intergenic space relative to all uniquely mapped reads or pairs in the standard chromosomes (n_intergenic / nMapUniq)

fracSplc.title: Fraction of spliced reads
fracSplc.description: Fraction of spliced reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) in reads mapped uniquely to the standard chromosomes (nSplc / nMapUniq).

fracLibOnce.title: Fraction of unduplicated reads
fracLibOnce.description: Fraction of unduplicated reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) in reads mapped uniquely to the standard chromosomes (nLibOnce / nMapUniq).

fracPosOnce.title: Fraction of genomic positions with exactly one mapped read
fracPosOnce.description: Fraction of genomic positions (one per read or read pair) in the standard chromosomes where exactly one read is mapped uniquely relative to all genomic position hits (nPosOnce / nPos)

fracPosHit.title: Fraction of genomic positions where reads are mapped
fracPosHit.description: Fraction of genomic positions (one per read or read pair) in the standard chromosomes where at least one read is mapped uniquely relative to the genome size (nPos / genome size)

fracBru.title: Fraction of reads from labeled spike-ins
fracBru.description: Fraction of reads or read pairs mapped to all Bru-labeled spike-ins relative to all mapped reads or read pairs (nMapLabeledAll / nMapAll)

fracBruUniq.title: Fraction of uniquely mapped reads from labeled spike-ins
fracBruUniq.description: Fraction of reads or read pairs mapped uniquely (MAPQ>=255) to all Bru-labeled spike-ins relative to all uniquely mapped reads or read pairs (nMapUniqLabeledAll / nMapUniqAll)
